case_title: M/s. Adamjee Insurance Company Limited, Lahore vs The CIR, CTO, Lahore
appellant: M/s. Adamjee Insurance Company Limited, Lahore

accussed_details.name: N/A
allegation: Non-payment of super tax for tax year 2022

complaint_summary: The appellant challenged the imposition of super tax under Section 4C of the Income Tax Ordinance, 2001 for tax year 2022, arguing that Rule 6(DA) of the Fourth Schedule makes it applicable from tax year 2023 onwards.
investigation_summary: The assessing officer imposed super tax on the appellant for tax year 2022, which was upheld by the Commissioner Inland Revenue (Appeals). The appellant argued that Rule 6(DA) excludes tax year 2022 from super tax applicability.
judgment_summary: The Tribunal annulled the orders passed by the Commissioner Inland Revenue (Appeals) and the assessing officer, holding that Rule 6(DA) of the Fourth Schedule makes super tax applicable from tax year 2023 onwards in the case of insurance companies.
Decision_or_verdict: Appeal accepted; orders imposing super tax for tax year 2022 annulled.
legal_arguments: Rule 6(DA) of the Fourth Schedule excludes tax year 2022 from super tax applicability.
Section 4C does not override Rule 6(DA) as both are part of the same statute.
Where two interpretations are possible, the one favoring the taxpayer should be adopted.
Fiscal statutes must be strictly construed.
statutes: Fourth Schedule to the Income Tax Ordinance, 2001
key_issues: Applicability of super tax under Section 4C for tax year 2022.
Interpretation of Rule 6(DA) of the Fourth Schedule.

legal_terms.Super Tax: Additional tax imposed on high-income entities.
legal_terms.Fourth Schedule: Special provisions for computation of profits and gains of insurance companies.

words_and_phrases.Tax Year 2022 onwards: Phrase used in Rule 6(DA) indicating applicability timeframe.

summary_vector_notes: The case revolves around the interpretation of Section 4C and Rule 6(DA) of the Income Tax Ordinance, 2001. The Tribunal ruled in favor of the appellant, holding that super tax is applicable from tax year 2023 onwards for insurance companies as per Rule 6(DA).
